title: Full-Stack & API Engineer (Cloudflare-Savvy, Part-Time)
description:
Bits N Bytes Inc. is a one-man digital fortress seeking reinforcement. I'm not a VC-funded startup — just a guy who builds fast, zero-trust systems and occasionally needs help wiring things together.

If you're handy with full-stack logic, API integrations, and especially know your way around Cloudflare (Pages, Workers, DNS, etc.), this could be a fun side mission for you.

This is low-budget, part-time, and async — but if you’ve got the skills and some free hours, I’ll make sure you’re compensated for your time and respected for your brain.

  • Tech stack: HTML5, edge-first logic, no SaaS bloat
  • Bonus if you're familiar with LLM integrations, structured data, or anti-cookie web strategies
  • Help build something weird and maybe important.

Interested? Ping through the contact page.
experienceRequirements: Comfortable with JavaScript, APIs, and edge-deployed logic (Cloudflare). Bonus for terminal scripting, HTML-only builds, or LLM/AI alignment knowledge.
qualifications: No degree needed — just show me you can build stuff without breaking everything.
